name: World of Hate
description:
Made for Punch nazis Jam 2017

WORLD OF HATE

It is one year into Donald Trump's Presidency. Donald Trump has not been seen for several months.

He is preoccupied with a plan to drop a nuke on Syria. He only communicates with the public through increasingly absurd executive orders.

Meanwhile, Antifa and fascist groups are clashing on the streets.

An antifascist transgirl, Jen, is making her way to D.C to protest Trump's nuclear plan.

THE GAME

This game is an arcade beat-em-up. It's also about the modern day (so much so that parts of it are already out of date) and I made it through february to march while in a very bad mood.

This game is probably slightly depressing, but I made it this way because I stuck to a vision. Not entirely sure how well I pulled it off but, meh, here it is, regardless.

This game is about beating nazis up, and thus is built around fun. Unlike average beat-em-ups, you can charge all your moves to make them more powerful, and the combat is more about crashing into enemies and careful deployment of moves, than spamming combos.

Soundtrack available on bandcamp HERE
